text:
e="preserve">Mir Hasil Khan Bizenjo (3 February 1958 – 20 August 2020; Urdu: میر حاصل خان بزنجو) was a Pakistani politician. He was Minister for Maritime Affairs from August 2017 to May 2018. He was a member of the National Party of Pakistan. Bizenjo was a member of the Senate of Pakistan from 2009 until his death.
Bizenjo was diagnosed with lung cancer in 2019. He died in Karachi on 20 August 2020, at the age of 62.
